title: 'The product quality seems to be going down'
body: I bought a set of these bottles a few months back and loved using them. Got another set and this turned out to be pretty poor quality. After using it for a few weeks, all the bottles leaked and the rubber gasket from two started coming out. I can't return them now but will try steel bottles from some other brand now.

title: Don't buy. The adhesive from the label ruins the look of the bottles
body: The bottles are fine and expensive too. However, the a reputed company lime Milton has used cheap labels with strong adhesive and removing these have been a nightmare even after soaking the bottles in soapy hot water and then scrubbing it off with non-stick scrubbers. Without using the scrubbers hard it was not possible to remove the labels. And this has completely ruined the appearance of the bottle and also has removed the logo too even before its very first use. Extremely disappointing! Buy steel bottles from other companies that use proper labels that come off easily and do not use cheap labels with strong glue on otherwise expensive bottles. I wish I didn't buy these!
